content.text: Requirements: 1 μs max. of duration of disturbance during the test. The connectors shall remain  fully engaged; the appearance of the connectors shall meet the requirements of test phase P1.
Exigences: Durée de perturbation max. de 1 μs pendant l'essai. Les connecteurs doivent rester  pleinement accouplés. L'aspect des connecteurs doit satisfaire aux exigences de la phase  d'essai P1.

requirements.text: Requirements: 1 μs max. of duration of disturbance during the test. The connectors shall remain  fully engaged; the appearance of the connectors shall meet the requirements of test phase P1.
